title: Online Collaborative Learning and Technology Utilization Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online collaboration tools, intermediate or higher digital literacy
context.additional_context: Application of collaboration strategies and motivational intervention techniques specialized for the language learning domain

learning_goals: Learners can apply task allocation and role adjustment protocols with over 90% accuracy in collaborative learning platforms.
Learners can maintain motivation levels above 80% during language task performance using peer feedback systems.
Learners can complete three or more successful cross-platform projects using digital tools (collaborative whiteboards, real-time document editors, etc.).

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Compatible Collaboration Software License
5 Smart Pads for Offline Workshop Use

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
